member.name: T:FBPRO.ProjectionHelper
member.summary: FBPRO - Fast Projection Without Trigonometry! Projection helpers using dot-product based calculations (no atan2/sin/cos).

member.name: M:FBPRO.ProjectionHelper.HeightToSegment(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Perpendicular distance from a point to the line defined by the segment.

member.name: M:FBPRO.ProjectionHelper.ProjectionArbitrary(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Scalar projection of one triangle side onto another (arbitrary triangle).

member.name: M:FBPRO.ProjectionHelper.ProjectionIsosceles(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Scalar projection for the isosceles triangle case.

member.name: M:FBPRO.ProjectionHelper.ProjectionParam(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Projection parameter t (0 = segment start, 1 = segment end). Use to check if the foot lies on the segment.

member.name: M:FBPRO.ProjectionHelper.ProjectionPoint(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double@,System.Double@)
member.summary: Foot of the perpendicular from the point onto the line (projection point).
